Class Hospital

java.lang.Object
Hospital
public class Hospital
extends java.lang.Object
The main Hospital Class. This is where all the patients and diseases are stored, and doctor objects are made.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Hospital()
    Creates a new instance of Hospital

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addDisease​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String treatment, int communicability, java.lang.String[] symptoms)
    This function adds a new Disease into the Hospital's list, and increments the number of diseases.
    void addPatient​(java.lang.String name, int category, java.lang.String[] symptoms)
    Adds a patient to the current patient list, and increments the number of patients
    Doctor assignDoctor​(Patient p)
    The assignDoctor function receives a patient object and checks if its ID field is even or odd.
    void diagnose​(Patient p)
    The diagnose function assigns a doctor to the patient and then assigns a disease to the patient.
    Disease[] getDiseases()
    Get the list of diseases in the hospital.
    int getNumDiseases()
    Get the number of diseases in the hospital.
    int getNumPatients()
    Get the number of patients in the hospital
    Patient[] getPatients()
    Get all patients of the hospital
    java.lang.String treatment​(Patient p)
    The function returns the treatment specified for the disease the patient is diagnosed with.

  • Method Details

    • getPatients

      public Patient[] getPatients()
      Get all patients of the hospital
      Returns:
      All patients in the hospital.

    • getNumPatients

      public int getNumPatients()
      Get the number of patients in the hospital
      Returns:
      Number of patients in the hospital.

    • getNumDiseases

      public int getNumDiseases()
      Get the number of diseases in the hospital.
      Returns:
      Number of diseases in the hospital's list.

    • getDiseases

      public Disease[] getDiseases()
      Get the list of diseases in the hospital.
      Returns:
      All diseases in the list for diagnosis.

    • addPatient

      public void addPatient​(java.lang.String name, int category, java.lang.String[] symptoms)
      Adds a patient to the current patient list, and increments the number of patients
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the patient,
      category - The category of admittance
      symptoms - The list of symptoms.

    • addDisease

      public void addDisease​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String treatment, int communicability, java.lang.String[] symptoms)
      This function adds a new Disease into the Hospital's list, and increments the number of diseases.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the disease.
      treatment - The name of the treatment for the disease.
      communicability - An integer denoting how communicable the disease is.
      symptoms - A list of Strings denoting the symptoms of the disease.

    • assignDoctor

      public Doctor assignDoctor​(Patient p)
      The assignDoctor function receives a patient object and checks if its ID field is even or odd. If ID is odd, then it returns a reference to the "House", else it returns a reference to the "Wilson" object.
      Parameters:
      p - A Patient object.
      Returns:
      The assigned Doctor's object reference.

    • diagnose

      public void diagnose​(Patient p)
      The diagnose function assigns a doctor to the patient and then assigns a disease to the patient.
      Parameters:
      p - A Patient object.

    • treatment

      public java.lang.String treatment​(Patient p)
      The function returns the treatment specified for the disease the patient is diagnosed with.
      Parameters:
      p - - A Patient object.
      Returns:
      The Treatment for the disease.
